name: Antelope Canyon (Lower)
description:
Introduction

This is the most photographed canyon in the world!

This is a commercial non-technical canyon in the Navajo Indian reservation. As of November 2014, there are two guide companies at the canyon. You are required to go into the canyon with a guide.

The Lower is not as good as the Upper. If you an only do one, do Antelope Canyon (Upper)

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Entry to this area may be restricted; check for information regarding permits before attempting this trip
